data.meta_description: I still remember the day when AVG Technologies went public at NYSE, back in 2012. Both Richard Seewald and Dennis Smith were there with us back then, alongsideâ€¦ | 11 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Just a few years ago, this would have sounded like pure science fiction... A Phoenix police officer pulled over a driverless Waymo car, after he saw it driving on the wrong side of the road into oncoming traffic. He stopped the car, only to find there was NOBODY in it. Who is he meant to give the ticket to? This, and much more, is discussed in the latest edition of "The AI Fix" #podcast with me and Mark Stockley. Find it in Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all good podcast apps - or at https://theaifix.show/6 #artificialintelligence #waymo #robotaxi

Does your organization have the right type of CISO? Many C-suite executives assume there's a one-size-fits-all CISO, but it's more nuanced than that. Different CISO profiles, from security architects to compliance experts, align with specific organizational needs. ğŸ‘‡ ğ—§ğ—µğ—² ğ—§ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—»ğ˜€ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—–ğ—œğ—¦ğ—¢ â†’ Thrives in fast-growing companies that scale and innovate. â†’ Best for organizations that need a leader to champion digital transformation. ğ—§ğ—µğ—² ğ—£ğ—¼ğ˜€ğ˜-ğ—•ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—®ğ—°ğ—µ ğ—£ğ—¼ğ˜„ğ—²ğ—¿-ğ—£ğ—¹ğ—®ğ˜†ğ—²ğ—¿ â†’ Excels as a crisis manager in the aftermath of a security breach. â†’ Best for companies that need an expert to revamp and strengthen their security. ğ—§ğ—µğ—² ğ—–ğ—¼ğ—ºğ—½ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—®ğ—»ğ—°ğ—² ğ—”ğ˜‚ğ˜ğ—µğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—¶ğ˜ğ˜† â†’ Has a deep understanding of compliance frameworks and legal requirements. â†’ Best for highly regulated industries like healthcare, finance, or government. ğ—§ğ—µğ—² ğ—§ğ—®ğ—°ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—°ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—–ğ—œğ—¦ğ—¢ â†’ Leverages business capabilities based on current technical/operational realities. â†’ Best for organizations with well-established security programs that want a leader to optimize operations with business goals ğ—§ğ—µğ—² ğ—¦ğ˜ğ—²ğ—®ğ—±ğ˜† ğ—¦ğ˜ğ—®ğ˜ğ—² ğ—–ğ—œğ—¦ğ—¢ â†’ Maintains and optimizes existing security maturity. â†’ Best for mature businesses that need consistent maintenance of established security programs. ğ—§ğ—µğ—² ğ—–ğ˜‚ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—¼ğ—ºğ—²ğ—¿-ğ—³ğ—®ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—–ğ—œğ—¦ğ—¢ â†’ Builds strong customer relationships to enhance a company's security image â†’ Best for tech companies where driving user engagement translates to business success Naturally, the ideal CISO fit depends on your organization's age, industry, and unique challenges. We'd also add that the best CISOs know cybersecurity isn't a destination. Rather, it's a tool that enables businesses to keep operating.
